quote: The night is dark and full of terrors
author: Melisandre

quote: There is only god and his name is death
author: Syrio Forel

quote: A lion doesn’t concern himself with the opinions of a sheep.
author: Tywin Lannister

quote: Power resides where men believe it resides. It’s a trick, a shadow on the wall. And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.
author: Lord Varys

quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die
author: Cersei Lannister

quote: Chaos isn’t a pit. Chaos is a ladder.
author: Lord Baelish

quote: Nothing f***s you harder than time.
author: Ser Davos

quote: All men must die, but we are not men.
author: Dany

quote: It doesn’t matter what we want. Once we get it, then we want something else
author: Lord Baelish

quote: Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armour, and it can never be used to hurt you.
author: Tyrion
